sentences.sContent: Many fish have ingenious ways of protecting their eggs from predators.
sentences.sCn: 很多鱼都有绝妙的方法来保护它们产的卵不被捕食者吃掉。

synos.tran: 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的

words.tran: 心灵手巧，独创性；精巧；精巧的装置
机敏（精巧；精致；有创造才能）

trans.tranCn: 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的
trans.tranOther: an ingenious plan, idea, or object works well and is the result of clever thinking and new ideas
